Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: accessToken
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The access token generated by the authorization server.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: refreshToken
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The refresh token, which can be used to obtain new access tokens using the same authorization grant.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: expiresIn
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The lifetime in seconds of the access token.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: tokenType
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: Typically “Bearer” when present. Otherwise, another tokenType value that the Client has negotiated with the Authorization Server.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: additionalData
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: Additional data parameters returned from the token server.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: idToken
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The type of token that the authorization server will return which encodes the userâ€™s authentication information.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: authorizationHeader
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: Creates authorization header from token type and access token. The authorization header is used in subsequent HTTP requests.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: tokenExpired
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The flag to indicate if the access token has expired.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: shouldRefresh
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: The flag to indicate if the access token should be refreshed.

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: init(from:)
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: Creates a new instance by decoding from the given decoder

Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.name: encode(to:)
Structs/TokenInfo.html#/s:14Authenticati.abstract: Encodes this value into the given encoder.
Returns a Boolean value indicating whether two values are equal.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: issuer
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The Issuer Identifier of the OpenID Connect Provider. This value is the same as the iss claim value in the ID tokens issued by this provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: authorization_endpoint
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The URL of the OpenID Connect Provider’s OAuth 2.0 Authorization Endpoint.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: token_endpoint
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The URL of the OpenID Connect Provider’s OAuth 2.0 Token Endpoint.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: userinfo_endpoint
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The URL of the OpenID Connect Provider’s UserInfo Endpoint.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: jwks_uri
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The URL of the OpenID Connect Provider’s JSON Web Key Set document. This document contains signing keys that clients use to validate the signatures from the provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: registration_endpoint
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The URL of the OpenID Connect Provider’s Dynamic Client Registration Endpoint

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: response_types_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of OAuth 2.0 response types supported by this provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: response_modes_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of OAuth 2.0 response modes supported by this provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: grant_types_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of OAuth 2.0 grant types supported by this provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: subject_types_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of Subject Identifier types supported by this provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: id_token_signing_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by this provider for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: id_token_encryption_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) supported by this provider for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: id_token_encryption_enc_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) supported by this provider for the ID Token to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: userinfo_signing_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: userinfo_encryption_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: userinfo_encryption_enc_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) JWA supported by the UserInfo Endpoint to encode the Claims in a JWT.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: request_object_signing_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the OpenID Connect Provider for Request Objects.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: request_object_encryption_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (alg values) supported by the OpenID Connect Provider for Request Objects.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: request_object_encryption_enc_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWE encryption algorithms (enc values) supported by the OpenID Connect Provider for Request Objects.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: token_endpoint_auth_methods_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of Client Authentication methods supported by this Token Endpoint. The options are client_secret_post, client_secret_basic, client_secret_jwt, and private_key_jwt.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: token_endpoint_auth_signing_alg_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the JWS signing algorithms (alg values) supported by the Token Endpoint for the signature on the JWT used to authenticate the Client at the Token Endpoint for the private_key_jwt and client_secret_jwt authentication methods.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: display_values_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the display parameter values that the OpenID Provider supports.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: claim_types_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the Claim Types that the OpenID Provider supports.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: claims_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array containing a list of the Claim Names of the Claims that the OpenID Provider may be able to supply values for.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: service_documentation
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A URL of a page containing human-readable information that developers might want or need to know when using the OpenID Provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: claims_locales_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array of languages and scripts supported for values in Claims being returned.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: ui_locales_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: An array of languages and scripts supported for the user interface.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: claims_parameter_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A boolean value specifying whether the OpenID Provider supports use of the claims parameter, with true indicating support.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: request_parameter_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A boolean value specifying whether the OpenID Provider supports use of the request parameter, with true indicating support.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: request_uri_parameter_supported
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A boolean value specifying whether the OpenID Provider supports use of the request_uri parameter, with true indicating support.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: require_request_uri_registration
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A boolean value specifying whether the OpenID Provider requires any request_uri values used to be pre-registered using the request_uris registration parameter. Pre-registration is required when the value is true.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: op_policy_uri
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A URL that the OpenID Provider provides to the person registering the Client to read about the OP’s requirements on how the Relying Party can use the data provided by the OpenID Provider.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.name: op_tos_uri
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: A URL that the OpenID Provider provides to the person registering the Client to read about OpenID Provider’s terms of service.

Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html.name: OIDCMetadataInfo
Structs/OIDCMetadataInfo.html.abstract: The metadata that describes an OpenID Connect Provider configuration.

Structs/TokenInfo.html.name: TokenInfo
Structs/TokenInfo.html.abstract: The authorization server issues an access token and optional refresh token. In addition the TokenInfo provides the token type and other properties supporting the access token.

Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html#/s:.name: oauthProvider(provider:didCompleteWithError:)
Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Tells the delegate when the initial authorization flow fails, and provides an error explaining why.

Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html#/s:.name: oauthProvider(provider:didCompleteWithCode:)
Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html#/s:.abstract: Tells the delegate when the initial authorization flow completes successfully.

Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html.name: OAuthProviderDelegate
Protocols/OAuthProviderDelegate.html.abstract: An interface for providing information about the outcome of an authorization code flow request initiated via the browser.

Enums/PKCE.html#/s:14Authentication4PKCE.name: generateCodeVerifier()
Enums/PKCE.html#/s:14Authentication4PKCE.abstract: Generates a cryptographically random string that is used to correlate the authorization request to the token request.

Enums/PKCE.html#/s:14Authentication4PKCE.name: generateCodeChallenge(from:)
Enums/PKCE.html#/s:14Authentication4PKCE.abstract: A challenge derived from the code verifier that is sent in the authorization request, to be verified against later.

Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html#/s:14Auth.name: plain
Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html#/s:14Auth.abstract: The plain transformation is for compatibility with existing deployments and for constrained environments that can’t use the S256 transformation.

Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html#/s:14Auth.name: S256
Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html#/s:14Auth.abstract: The client uses output of a suitable random number generator to create a 32-octet sequence.

Enums/OAuthProviderError.html#/s:14Authe.name: invalidResponse
Enums/OAuthProviderError.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The authorization request received an invalid response.

Enums/OAuthProviderError.html#/s:14Authe.name: general(message:)
Enums/OAuthProviderError.html#/s:14Authe.abstract: The authorization attempt failed for an unknown reason.

Enums/OAuthProviderError.html.name: OAuthProviderError
Enums/OAuthProviderError.html.abstract: A type that indicates when OAuth operartion encounters an error.

Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html.name: CodeChallengeMethod
Enums/CodeChallengeMethod.html.abstract: A method used to derive code challenge.

Enums/PKCE.html.name: PKCE
Enums/PKCE.html.abstract: Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE) by OAuth 2.0 public clients.

Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.name: delegate
Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.abstract: A delegate that the OAuth provider informs about the success or failure of an authorization request via the browser.

Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.name: authorizeWithBrowser(issuer:redirectUrl:presentingViewController:codeChallenge:method:scope:state:shareSession:)
Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.abstract: Launches the browser to initiate the authorization code (AZN) flow using optional Proof Key for Code Exchange (PKCE).

Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.name: authorize(issuer:redirectUrl:authorizationCode:codeVerifier:scope:completion:)
Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.abstract: The authorization code is obtained by using an authorization server as an intermediary between the client and resource owner.

Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.name: authorize(issuer:username:password:scope:completion:)
Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.abstract: The resource owner password credentials (i.e., username and password) can be used directly as an authorization grant to obtain an access token.

Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.name: refresh(issuer:refreshToken:scope:completion:)
Classes/OAuthProvider.html#/s:14Authenti.abstract: Refresh tokens are issued to the client by the authorization server and are used to obtain a new access token when the current access token becomes invalid or expires, or to obtain additional access tokens with identical or narrower scope.

Classes/OAuthProvider.html.name: OAuthProvider
Classes/OAuthProvider.html.abstract: The OAuthProvider enables third-party applications to obtain limited access to an HTTP service, either on behalf of a resource owner by orchestrating an approval interaction between the resource owner and the HTTP service, or by allowing the third-party application to obtain access on its own behalf.
